timeline.bodyText: Why is this logger.warn() and not logger.info(), is this intentional?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: after all the retries are exhausted we want to print a warn message indicating failure. however when there are more retry attempt are left we want to print a info message.
replies.author: moderakh

timeline.bodyText:
It would be better if we can have this as a JVM parameter as well defined in Configs.java
So that if we want the customer to increase the depth size, we don't have to change the code, release and ask them to upgrade.
With JVM params, they can just update the param value and they can re-start their application.
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText:
We should put these in a try with finally block to close both StringWriter and PrintWriter in case there is any issue serializing the exception.
Just as a safety check so that we don't have memory leaks.
timeline.author: kushagraThapar
